trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the user decides not to trust the entity that is requesting a token after reviewing the information from their certificate.
trans-unit.target: 当用户决定不信任该实体，查看其证书中的信息后正在请求标记时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the user clicks "I am not satisfied with this organization's identity/policies" in the [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/add/includes/infocard-md.md)] user interface.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击"我不满意此组织的标识/策略"中，将引发此异常[!INCLUDE[infocard](~/add/includes/infocard-md.md)]用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref> class.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性为系统提供的消息的描述错误并将当前系统区域性考虑在内的新实例。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content of the message should be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容应该是为用户所理解。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>对象，其中包含有关所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>包含有关源或目标的上下文信息的对象。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UntrustedRecipientException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
